div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 07:55 am CDT

div.div: Partly sunny, with a high near 65. Windy, with a north northwest wind 25 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. Breezy, with a north wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 76. West wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south in the afternoon.

School is closed for students for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year
Students Please check your emails and Google Classrooms for E-Learning
